meanings.sent1: The clanky old car woke up the whole neighborhood with its noisy engine.
meanings.sent2: The metal gate made a clanky noise every time it swung open.
meanings.sent3: The clanky pots and pans in the kitchen sounded like a band practicing.
meanings.sent4: The clanky machinery in the factory hummed with productivity.
meanings.sent5: The clanky door hinges announced the arrival of each guest with a metallic melody.

meanings.sent1: The old truck made a clanky as it drove down the street.
meanings.sent2: The clanky of the hammer echoed through the workshop.
meanings.sent3: The clanky of the coins in the piggy bank signaled it was full.
meanings.sent4: The clanky of the wind chimes added a musical touch to the garden.
meanings.sent5: The clanky of the train passing by could be heard from miles away.
